name: Siege Gunner

sections.body: You take no size penalty for aiming a direct-fire siege weapon larger than yourself. If you operate an indirect-fire siege weapon and miss, you misdirect fire by 1 square per range increment.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Direct-fire weapons impose a –2 attack roll penalty per size category by which the weapon is larger than the creature aiming it. An indirect-fire weapon that misses misdirects fire by 1d4 squares per range increment.
sections.name: Normal

description: Aiming outsized siege weapons poses little difficulty for you.
